description: From trail running to hiking and cold-weather workouts, this hybrid pant is for those who never let the temperature slow them down. Built to provide you with the ultimate combination of comfort, style, and performance, you can bring coziness to all your active moments, with a moisture-wicking fabric density that creates warmth while allowing you to move with total ease.
name: Prana Ice Flow Hybrid Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Recycled polyester blend winter weight jersey with cozy brushed interior. Contrast woven
